sorcer.service

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.service.Condition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Arg, Call, Conditional, Evaluation<java.lang.Object>, EvaluationComponent, SupportComponent, Request, Scopable, Service, Substitutable

    public class Condition
extends java.lang.Object
implements Evaluation<java.lang.Object>, Conditional, java.io.Serializable
    A Condition specifies a conditional eval in a given service context for its free variables in the form of path/eval pairs with paths being guard parameters of a closure expression.
    See Also:
    LoopMogram, OptMogram, AltMogram, Serialized Form
